description:
Students project on our second Game JAM in our school, ESA Games.

The theme of this Game JAM was : "Gilets Jaunes & Soylent Green"

We had restrictions on this theme :

  1. No FPS
  2. No guns
  3. No incitement to violence

It may features some bugs and I'm actually trying to fix that.

This game was made in 36 hours.

You must capture the 3 points that are on the map before capturing the last one and you have to dodge policeman.

You have boost that can help you by calling reinforcement or destroy barricades way easier !

TEAM :

Alice "Amelyse" DONNET - Game Designer, IA Programmer

Kévin MOUTTE - Game Designer, Programmer

Gabriel LOEFFLER - Environnement Art, Character Designer

Nathan MANSARD - Narrative Designer, Sound Designer
